website_summaries.verdict: An excellent value. Though pricier than some Furby products, you get a great deal of interaction and fun.
pros: More interactive than Furbies from earlier generations - and the more it "hears," the more it develops
App enhances the toy but is not required

customer_reviews.title: Great friend for a little kid.
customer_reviews.text: Careful, one leads to two and so forth. My kid loved her Furby so much we had to get another for the Furby to play with. Yippee. They communicate with each other when you place two side by side. Furbacca and this one appear to talk to each other, plotting...You can change between 5 voices with this one.
customer_reviews.author: The Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Furby for my birthday and I love it. It does talk a lot and change personality based on how much you interact with it. It is REALLY loud, but pulling the tail for ten seconds does make it go to sleep...but not for long. It is sensitive to sound and touch. Great buy though, I would definitely like to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Love my Furby
customer_reviews.text: Love my Furby. I am still trying to change the personality but so far is really fun. If you are a late adopter they push buying a crystal furby which I am not interested in. You can buy the additional features which are just mainly cosmetic like crystals instead of water come out of the shower and the health meters and stuff are rainbows. You need a tablet or smartphone to get the most out of this Furby. They are very soft and fun and you can turn it off by pulling the tail for 10 seconds or at least leave it alone for a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: EUGENE FULTON

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Furby
customer_reviews.text: This particular Furby did NOT work properly so we are returning. Yes, we used new batteries, took them out, waited 60 secs, put them back in, pressed the reset button...everything we are supposed to do to "fix" the thing. But it continually falls asleep after less than 30 secs and/or blacks out. We purchased another boom (all blue fur) at same time and it works perfectly! We are going to purchase a different one hoping it will work. These were Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: someonewhoshops

customer_reviews.title: hours of fun. And they really are adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these little guys for my granddaughters. Let me just say, they totally forgot about the Hatchimals. They wore down their ipad batteries with all the activities associated with the Furby. They haven't stopped playing with them . Beware tho, they DO have different moods.Evil Furby is truly there but holding him upside down while pulling his tail gets him back to loveable mode. You can find whatever you need to know on youtube. They were beyond worth the money, hours of fun. And they really are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Mac

customer_reviews.title: Super cute toy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 7 year old brother and he absolutely loves it! It is to much fun to watch it sing, dance, fart/burp, and talk! We also downloaded the interactive app so that he can play games, feed, and let his furby use the toilet. The furby is so much fun that my other brother also wanted one, so now that we have 2 they actually talk with each other. And if they ever get annoying we simply pull their tail for a few seconds and they fall asleep! :)
customer_reviews.author: Angel Demure

customer_reviews.title: We love furby!!!
customer_reviews.text: Furby is so much fun. My 6 year old hasn't put it down since Christmas. He loves the app capability and that he can play with it alone as well. Furby has different personalities and does some wild things compared to the first furby from the 90s but after watching a few YouTube videos we figured out how to get it back to nice furby instead of the evil furby it had became. It's fun :))
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Addictive Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My very young niece received this for Christmas and I fell in love with it. I had to get one for myself. I am a grown man but do find myself interacting, ok well talking to my WayKO (that's my Furby's name) frequently. I have an original from the late 90's and they have really kept what was great about the original while giving it a lot more personality. It's also fun to play with the app, not sure about the whole taking it to the toilet experience, but it's fun.
customer_reviews.author: C. GREEN

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this Furby creaks and grinds a lot when moving. The other two that I bought for my friends are not that loud. Aside from that, I think this is one of the cutest Furbies in the series. I thought it would be totally hideous in person, but it's so adorable and I like that the colors all match. The shiny, metallic face plate is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: My son was very, very happy to spend his holiday money on this toy. I can't say as an adult that I'm happy to have a Furby in the house, but if he's happy then I'm happy! :) This toy really is amazing, especially if you have an iPad and can incorporate the app. He loves feeding him food, making him feel better and watching them lay eggs. It really is cute! If only there was an off switch.... LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Trip-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Crazy toy, but my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast and just as described. This thing talks a ton- we put it in a dark drawer to be quiet! The kids enjoy playing with this along with the ipad app - it comes with instructions. Part of the fun is the app interaction. It says all kinds of crazy phrases. I'm not keen on it burping & tooting- I don't encourage bad manners, but the kids think that is so hilarious!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: ... Christmas last year and I thought it would be fun to see how the Furbys interact with each other
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got a Furby Boom for Christmas last year and I thought it would be fun to see how the Furbys interact with each other. We also bought one of the little baby Furbys and they are very entertaining to listen to. They learn the other Furby's name, and they will songs together. They talk to the baby and it's really cute. We love Furby.
customer_reviews.author: R. Needham

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this for a 6-year-old girl. I was attracted by the interaction factor and could just imagine her singing along with the Furby. I wasn't too sure about the internet app factor, but it was easy to install and easy for her to use. She loved him.
customer_reviews.author: wahlnut

customer_reviews.title: My Grandaughter's jaw dropped!
customer_reviews.text: This Furby has been the talk around my granddaughter's second grade class. She was really hoping Santa would think she had been good this year and would reward her with this great Holiday Sweater Edition. I really think she had lost all hope, when she opened up the strange "round" shaped box. Her jaw dropped...she spent several seconds in silence. What a noise she made when she was able to compose herself. The best gift this year for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: RoseMary

customer_reviews.title: Unique Fur Style
customer_reviews.text: I collect Furbys and I bought the Holiday Sweater Furby. These generation Furbys have cool features which I used on this one: connects to my cellphone by using the Furby app so I can feed it, play with it, and other things. The unique fur is so cool, it is definitely like a holiday sweater. If your looking for a Furby with unique fur style, I suggest getting the Holiday Sweater Furby.
customer_reviews.author: LittleMermaid

customer_reviews.title: Love Furby !
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this cute guy ! I am a huge Furby fan and this one is my favorite pattern thus far. The colors are brighter than I expected them to be, comparing them to the picture. Another purchase on Amazon I was very pleased with. It was definitely an Amazon Christmas in 2013 at my house. lol
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: lol - it just needs an off switch, right?
customer_reviews.text: Pull on the tail for over ten seconds to put the furby to sleep. ;-) The only issue is, our kittens like playing with the Furby, too, at night. And, will drag it into our room by the ears (the ears look special and loved now). Kiddo plays with the thing every day for a bit, then uses the tail trick to put it to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie Power! ®

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids- Not for parents!!
customer_reviews.text: Son LOVES this thing and so do his friends... it doesn't have a volume control and the darn thing is so loud and annoying!! lol I wish I could turn it down... or off! Ha! (Now I know how my parents felt...). But seriously it is a bit too loud
customer_reviews.author: ShayMarie ClareDe

customer_reviews.title: and her sweater pattern is just adorable.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter was thrilled. This generation of furbies are no where near as irritating as the last one. She's not as loud, nor does she talk as incessantly as the previous generation of Furby. Her sparkly ears and feet are so cute, and her sweater pattern is just adorable.
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN HOFFMAN

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets!!! This Ones A Keeper
customer_reviews.text: This Toy Right Here Is Gonna Make My Daughter Very Happy. It's Bigger Than What it Looks Like From Pictures Online, It Also Came In Excellent Condition, Packaged By Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: and they are annoying..
customer_reviews.text: They aren't very durable, they eat batteries, and they are annoying... The furby boom APP is the worst app I have ever seen as well. Miserable. All that said, it gets 3 stars because my daughter likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Preston

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait for Christmas, these guys all have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait for Christmas, these guys all have a different sweater pattern, I ordered 2 and was worried about telling them apart, and I don't see a problem here.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Fur-baby!
customer_reviews.text: What a delightful toy for my g-kid! Everyone had a blast playing with it! I have a couple of the original Furby's and didn't think I would care for these plastic ears but they do not detract in anyway from the toy. The kids took them as they made the rounds on Christmas Eve and everyone decided they had to get one for their kids! Great time had by all!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgirl

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: bought this furby for my kids 6 and 3 years old for Christmas. It's 8 months later and they still love him and play with him almost every day. I suggest using rechargeable batteries though cause they wear out quickly and parents tired of hearing him yap? Pull his tail and hold till he falls asleep....=)
customer_reviews.author: M. Ram

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Turned on for less than a minute and screeched and crackled. Then died. Does this every time we try different batteries or reset it. Ruined my 4 year olds christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Chavez

customer_reviews.title: great Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a robot and everything I found was very expensive. I then remembered I had a furbie when I was little and it was everything my five year old son would need in a robot. It amazed me how the furbie has advanced since I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: kylee

customer_reviews.title: Fury Boom Plush Toy
customer_reviews.text: I felt bad for that little girl who belong to my two granddaughters 's sister that her mother has not much money so I bought it for her but that girl was real surprised and excited to have this ..for my big heart for her . She loved and excited to have this .
customer_reviews.author: Susan Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Everyone was laughing and having a great time.
customer_reviews.text: This little guy was the biggest hit at out christmas party exchange. We play the gift exchange where you can 'steal' a previous present picked. This guy was 'stolen' multiple times. Afterward, they couldn't wait to put in the batteries. Everyone was laughing and having a great time.
customer_reviews.author: Molly M.

customer_reviews.title: Holiday sweater Furby
customer_reviews.text: Furby is back again and more interactive than ever. This little guy has a mind of his own and they come in a variety of colors. This one is ready for the holidays would make a great prize at your next ugly sweater party!
customer_reviews.author: Wstoner

customer_reviews.title: Novelty
customer_reviews.text: I suppose these guys are more fun if you have the ability to interact with more than one. He's cute but changes personality quite frequently without all the "personal" interaction. Probably would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Furby
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old, as this was on his Christmas list & he loves it. Its very easy for him to use along with the interaction between the Furby & iphone app. My 2 year old really enjoys it as well. The only down side for us is there is no turn off button, so we put him back in his box so he will stop talking & go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: tphilly

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with iPad interaction
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece who was 6 years old. She loved it so much that she wanted to take it everywhere. Lots of fun activities on the iPad that interacts with Furby. Even all the adults loved it. Awesome toy!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Chen

customer_reviews.title: Furby Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift Christmas gift for my granddaughter. I'm not sure which of us enjoyed it more! While I no longer get to play with it (she took it home), I believe she is still having a fine time with her new friend. Thanks Furby and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: J Lynch

customer_reviews.title: So annoying, even my child doesn't play with it.
customer_reviews.text: my child HAD HAD HAD to have this Furby. In the 4 months since I bought it, she has played with it three times.
customer_reviews.author: Romana III

customer_reviews.title: Furby Boom the toy that keeps you laughing!
customer_reviews.text: This little furry dude is to cute not to want to play with. I bought it fory grandchildren ages 3-14. My 14 Is hooked on it. If you don't have an app for it on your phone it doesn't give you the full benifit of the interaction with out it. Having another one makes you feel left out when they talk to one another. I found it to be quite amazing. You will be laughing so much it does so many comments. It's like having a small child. You never no what it will say next. So cool! I even like to play with it. Joann Kanter
customer_reviews.author: Joann Kanter

customer_reviews.title: My Mom Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not I bought this for my mom after she saw how much fun my great niece had with it. She's enjoyed it and so far it hasn't gotten on her nerves. She says it understands her and she even "rocks" it to sleep, LOL. I plan on getting one myself. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter is obsessed with funnies and this one is awesome! I love his shiny ears and his unique ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with funnies and this one is awesome! I love his shiny ears and his unique coloring! He is everything you except from a furby. She was so excited!
customer_reviews.author: john tyler

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Sent it to Europe as a present. Stopped working after 3 days. Wakes up and goes back to sleep again. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Love this little fella
customer_reviews.text: This thing is adorable! The colors are nicely done and it looks even better in hand then it does in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Cordle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Funny and hard to find. It's limited edition with Holiday Sweater patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Tansel Zilayaz

customer_reviews.title: furby lover
customer_reviews.text: My little girl is a Furby lover and collector. She loved this one. Since it is a Christmas one, further down the line it will be worth more. My daughter keeps up with that. Prettier than pic shows.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the cutest one out there. The only thing i do not like is it does not have turn off button or volume control. does well with ipad app.
customer_reviews.author: jaimepoohbr

customer_reviews.title: Inoperable after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work after having it only 2 weeks. I will attempt to return it. The kids liked it while it worked. They downloaded an app and had fun with that.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Drees

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my little sister for Christmas, it came a day earlier than expected! I love it just a much as she does. It's a pretty cool toy. and The Holiday Sweater Edition is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: KaylaLoki

customer_reviews.title: As much as I'd personally love that, my daughter was upset
customer_reviews.text: Cute but arrived dead. It had all the movements but no sound at all. As much as I'd personally love that, my daughter was upset. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her furby. He comes on at random sometimes but it's comical!
customer_reviews.author: Stashia

customer_reviews.title: FURBYS BE GOODIES
customer_reviews.text: Furby. Been there done that but not like this. The new ones are sassy and learn fast and can be addictive if you have more than one grandkid and furby around. ME LIKE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dustbunny

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Eats batteries, but the kids love him/her/it. Cheaper than the other patterns, works the same.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son love, love loves this Furby. it is pretty splashy looking compared to regular - looks fancy :)
customer_reviews.author: Cellens

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The furby was cute and worked well and I enjoyed watching him talk to my other furbys. However the Furby app is very disappointing as it would not work with any of my Boom Furbies.
customer_reviews.author: Florida gal

customer_reviews.title: but it was the "must have" at the time and my kids enjoyed them for a while
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived with a paint chip missing from the beak. Was able to exchange it for new. Eats batteries, but it was the "must have" at the time and my kids enjoyed them for a while
customer_reviews.author: jewaso

customer_reviews.title: Barely works
customer_reviews.text: Constantly resets and changes voices. Batteries die in days. Terribly expensive toy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: JFloyd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing edition
customer_reviews.text: Far one of my favorites. We have purchased lots of Furbys. They are awesome. But this one is nicer and I love his shiny red around the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana PiegariTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's good, but my nephew just played a few times. It's always the same words and same games.
customer_reviews.author: Heder Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: grand daughter loved it, it was a great gift. this was for a 4 year old, it was cute and the eyes on it were really neat. Her favorite toy for the holiday
customer_reviews.author: LynnW

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loved the toy and interaction program online was great. They say very funny phrases. I would highly recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: P K

customer_reviews.title: Cute little guy!
customer_reviews.text: A hit at a good price. Grandchildren think he is a hoot.
customer_reviews.author: Konaman

customer_reviews.title: Furby boom
customer_reviews.text: A furby is a furby. However, it was listed as an after Christmas mega sale. I should have researched more. It was much cheaper at Kroger-almost half the price.
customer_reviews.author: chipmunk53

customer_reviews.title: Furby Fan!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 furbies for Christmas gifts for my g-kids. We decided to take them out of the boxes and starting "shaping " their personalities. The little guys are addictive. I took them to work and they went all over the office. They even went to one meeting. They are amazing and even interacted with another talking toy. We actually miss having them around.
customer_reviews.author: Zenbaby

customer_reviews.title: Furbbies have changed
customer_reviews.text: We love this little guy. I had a Furby years ago....Wow have they changed!! My son hooked this up to his iPhone and we had a blast feeding and playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: TBJB

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. Worked just fine and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Dawn Meddings

customer_reviews.title: Furby
customer_reviews.text: I really like these I am saving them for christmas for my children the colors are cute glad I bought this
customer_reviews.author: DanielleTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: The best one yet!
customer_reviews.text: It's adorable and funny and does so much. The apple app adds alot of extra activity and I have not fully tried it out yet but more than the 2012 furby app. Watched my niece play and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Lndaberg

customer_reviews.title: Furby is well loved and causing mischief in my house
customer_reviews.text: Almost a year later, Furby is well loved and causing mischief in my house. Have a very happy four year old.
customer_reviews.author: PoptartGirlWonder

customer_reviews.title: Furby
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter's birthday and it is adorable and she was thrilled. She now has two so they can talk to each other.
customer_reviews.author: B.C.Miller

customer_reviews.title: Furby boom
customer_reviews.text: The children really loved the Furby Boom. They played with them immediately after opening them for Christmas. They were a great purchase. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Ewalt

customer_reviews.title: Funny fur by
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy and won't put it down it makes her laugh it does so many different things.
customer_reviews.author: michele b.

customer_reviews.title: Furby was the hit of Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 6 year old daughter. She loves it. Her 13 year old sister help her figure it out and the app makes it especially fun.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed and my child was practically devastated
customer_reviews.text: Furby booms voice started skipping in less than a month. to much drama to return it. Pretty disappointed and my child was practically devastated.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Panyard

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: love it! beautiful details and a lot of fun to play with. played for hours with family. also got their friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Great gift for a child. When it does what you tell it to do, I think, what will they think of next?
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Said it was New. It was not! It was used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good toy to have fun with but will burn through some batteries
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Haff

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This is annoying to adults but honestly kids haven't put it down they love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Furby is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Our grand daughter loves this Furby and it's driving our son and daughter in law crazy! Seriously though she really loves this gift.
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: disappointed but hasbro is replacing free and very nice about ...
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after very few times of gentle use , disappointed but hasbro is replacing free and very nice about it!
customer_reviews.author: selena plumley

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas. I wasn't sure if he would like the sweater design but I bought it anyway because the price was less than the other designs. My son absolutely loves the toy and the sweater design. I like how interact it is. It's a really smart toy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. N-W

customer_reviews.title: Furby
customer_reviews.text: Really a neat Toy, it's so cute, got it set up to one of our IPads, and it does all kinds of neat things
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: The toy worked as expected and fun to play with. My granddaughter loves it and ask for it often. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Desjardins

customer_reviews.title: This toy is cute, but I mainly got it ...
customer_reviews.text: This toy is cute, but I mainly got it because I thought it would interact with the app. I do not know of a child who would not get frustrated with trying to sync the app to the toy....it only works about 1 our of 20 times.
customer_reviews.author: edi murray

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of those toys that grandpas and grandkids like, but drives mama crazy - lol.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ausbourne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift and I was surprised that the sweater pattern isn't as ugly as you would think.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: The furby arrived in record time to make my great-granddaughter very happy for Christmas because that was a gift from Santa! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Todee

customer_reviews.title: Furby Holiday Sweater Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: My neice loves Furby Holiday sweater edition toy. It did what it was supposed to do, it made her happy.
customer_reviews.author: C F

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my daughter and she loves the sweater design on it.
customer_reviews.author: versacel

customer_reviews.title: Always a problem with my Booms
customer_reviews.text: I had another Furby Boom earlier, but it broke. Now, it's battery cover is not right, and makes noise when it moves or sleeps.
customer_reviews.author: william l rowan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as cute in person! My 5 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Loved the bright colourful patterns of our new Furby boom (I bought holiday sweater and peackock)
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly, colours are bright and it looks beautiful. Kids have not played with it yet as it is waiting for the birthday, but I ordered 2, checked them both, they are working fine. Can't wait to give them to my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Nataliya Garon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only toy my grandchildres asked for for Christmas. This was the only place I could find them. Big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Aleta Albert

customer_reviews.title: My other daughter always want furby so bad! So I have buy one for her Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: My other daughter always want furby so bad ! So I have buy one for her Christmas gift . She was excited about it .
customer_reviews.author: Natishia Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Christmas furby
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter loves her furby!!!! She was super happy santa read her list and picked this to deliver to her.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much! My daughter loves it! ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much! My daughter loves it! It's just what she wanted! We received it a lot sooner than expected too! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: claim
customer_reviews.text: Dear sirs Buy 3 Furby via Amazon.com Are genuine, sealed in their boxes. Two of them were opened for use After about two weeks of normal use, both put their black eyes and do not respond to any external stimulus. Almost went out. I changed batteries but the problem persists. They can give us any suggestions of what happens? What can we do with them? thanks
customer_reviews.author: MARCELO BOCAZ

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter loves it and that is best feedback that anyone could give, would definitely buy it again and price was right
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Great throwback gift
customer_reviews.text: I chose this gift as a throw-back gift for my son, modernized of course, but still fun. He loves it and I'm glad he does.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Don't give to a child younger than 10, Just my opinion!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the idea of any child having a toy that has multiple personalities and having another furby interact with it n having "eggs". What are we teaching our children these days! Aside from that it is cute and interesting to learn furbish talk.
customer_reviews.author: Bethann

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: broken as it would not talk, just moved mouth and buzzed or hummed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara, GA

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We purchase a Furby Boom for my 6 year old daughter and my 3 year old son was instantly jealous. I purchased on a Saturday night and received Monday morning.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Moctezuma

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy for a 10 year old.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great-granddaughter for Christmas. She loved it immediately. It was easy for her to program it with her i phone.It's cute, works great, and the price was right. I would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis Martin

customer_reviews.title: I Brought it my little brother loves it so much ...
customer_reviews.text: I Brought it my little brother loves it so much next time i am going to order this again thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

product_meta.title: Furby Boom Plush Toy (Holiday Sweater Edition)
product_meta.description:
FURBY BOOM (HOLIDAY SWEATER EDITION)


Get ready, because Furby Boom is the beginning of an adventure. A New Generation Is Hatching on the free Furby Boom app, where you and your Furby Boom can collect digital eggs, hatch them, and raise a city of virtual Furby Furblings.

The Furby population is booming because Furby Boom can hatch more than 50 virtual Furby Furblings eggs!View larger Can you hatch enough virtual Furblings to fill the towers of your city and get the golden egg?View larger Team up with your Furby Boom and your virtual Furblings to play games in the app such as Furball, the Furbish version of soccer. View larger Keep track of your Furby Boom creature's health, hunger and cleanliness levels using the app's monitor. View larger Furby Boom has A Mind of Its Own and combines physical and digital ways to play!View larger This Furby Boom creature has more than twice as many responses as the previous Furby.View larger 

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
A whole new generation of Furby critters is about to hatch. Dust off your Furbish dictionary and get ready to party with your Furby Boom creature. Your Furby has a mind of its own and the way you treat your Furby will shape its personality -- so the more fun you have with it, the better. It speaks more English the more you play with it. Tickle your Furby, talk to it and feed it with your finger. Play some tunes, pull some tails and party on with your Furby Boom creature. You can also download a free app to have a Furby Boom adventure and translate Furbish. Take care of your Furby, get virtual eggs and hatch and raise the Furblings. The Furby app is optional and works with iPad, iPod touch and iPhone with iOS 5.0 or later. The app is not compatible with prior Furby generations. Check Furby.com for device compatibility. Furby and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: The more you talk to your Furby and interact with it, the more English it speaks
The way you treat your Furby shapes its personality
Pull and hold tail for 10 seconds to make Furby sleep
Play games, get eggs and raise virtual Furblings with the free Furby Boom app
App is optional and works with iPad, iPod touch and iPhone
